Text: Your website (minirlss.net) got suspended. Any alternative to it?
@c2w: Its just a temporary thing, we should be back by evening
Will you upload Person Of Interest S02E03 ? And your site is down, It there any alternative one ?
Yes, you can visit our alternative site - the blog version of our site which i have mentioned in the 3rd comment, there all our uploads have been posted
I think u guys would have probably noticed by now, but anyways the site is up and running properly.
@soda: Totally apologize for it, it was actually an another member of our team, none of us have any intentions of spamming, so no more efforts to disguise a link
